thread.title: Happy national foreskin day! | Flipboard

author: hivplusmag.com - Plus Editors
title: Happy national foreskin day! | Flipboard
text: Happy national foreskin day! The unofficial holiday is embraced by ONE Condoms, which reports that 79 percent of people with foreskin have difficulty using condoms. April 4 may … More stories from [Condoms](/topic/condoms) More stories from [Contraception](/topic/contraception) [Hormonal Birth Control Doesn’t Deserve Its Bad Reputation](/topic/contraception/hormonal-birth-control-doesn-t-deserve-its-bad-reputation/a-LNixaCejRI2MkyWRswEAxQ%3Aa%3A221841707-66548db98a%2Ftime.com) Almost two-thirds of U.S. women of reproductive age use some kind of contraception, according to the latest federal data. And millions of them use methods that contain hormones, including birth control pills, intrauterine devices (IUDs), rings, implants, injections, and patches.
